sen.j: 藪井 星池（やぶい せいち、寛延元年（1748年） – 文化 (元号)13年閏8月23日 (旧暦)（1816年10月14日））は、江戸時代中期の日本の篆刻家である。
sen.e: Seichi YABUI (1748-October 14, 1816) was a tenkokuka (artist of seal engraving) in the mid-Edo period.
Seichi YABUI (1748-October 14, 1816) was a Japanese tenkokuka (artist of seal engraving) in the mid-Edo period.
Seichi YABUI (1748-October 14, 1816) was a Japanese tenkokuka (artist of seal engraving) in the mid-Edo period.

sen.j: 名は千秋、字を子長、星池は号 (称号)。
sen.e: His name was Senshu, azana (adult male's nickname) was Shicho and Seichi was his second name or alias.
His name was Senshu, his azana (adult male's nickname) was Shicho and Seichi was his pseudonym.
sen.cmt: 余分スペースの削除、号をpseudonymに変更、his追加
sen.e: His name was Senshu, his azana (adult male's nickname) was Shicho and Seichi was his pseudonym.

sen.j: 中国風に修して藪星池と称した。
sen.e: He changed his name in Chinese style to Seichi YABU.
He changed his name in Chinese style to Seichi YABU.
He changed his name in Chinese style to Seichi YABU.
He was from Fushimi.
He was from Fushimi.
He was from Fushimi.
Brief biography
Brief biography
Brief biography
He served the Nijo-Suminokura family.
He served the Nijo-Suminokura family.
He served the Nijo-Suminokura family.

sen.j: 俳諧・狂歌をよくし、傍らで篆刻を嗜んだ。
sen.e: He enjoyed kyoka (comic waka) and haikai (humorous renga) while engraving seals.
He enjoyed kyoka (comic waka) and haikai (humorous renga) while engraving seals.
He enjoyed kyoka (comic waka) and haikai (humorous renga) while engraving seals.

sen.j: 印譜に『星池印譜』・『白雪歌堂印譜』がある。
sen.e: Some of his Inpu include "Seichi Inpu" and "Hakusetsukado Inpu."
His Inpu included "Seichi Inpu" and "Hakusetsukado Inpu."
His Inpu included "Seichi Inpu" and "Hakusetsukado Inpu."

sen.j: 京都河原町通東に住んだが、文化 (元号)年間は浪華に住んだ。
sen.e: He lived in Kawaramachi Street Higashi, Kyoto, but during 1804 to 1817 he lived in Naniwa.
He lived in Kawaramachi Street Higashi, Kyoto but 1804 to 1817, lived in Naniwa.
He lived in Kawaramachi Street Higashi, Kyoto but 1804 to 1817, lived in Naniwa.
Died at the age of 69.
Died at the age of 69.
Died at the age of 69.
